size: 0.5 KG, 1 KG, 1.5 KG, 2 KG, 3 KG, 5 KG, 6 KG, 12 KG
usage: gym exercise, help tone and sculpt arms, shoulders and back
key_features: Color coded thick vinyl coating for comfortable and non-slip feel
Hexagon shaped edges for easy storage and prevent rolling
Neoprene-coated for durability and to help protect you, the floor and other fitness equipment
Able to be washed without damage
ai_description: Vibrant vinyl-coated dumbbells in pink, white, red, blue, and green colors with clear weight markings (0.5KG to 12KG). Hexagonal-shaped ends prevent rolling and allow easy stacking. The KAKSS brand is prominently printed in white on each dumbbell end. Features a durable neoprene/vinyl coating over a cast-iron core, designed for comfortable grip and protection. Shown in both studio shots and lifestyle settings with fitness equipment.
